prodNameC: 貝克曼庫爾特 賽特斯 CD3-FITC/CD56-RD1
ingredientsDesc: CLONES: UCHT1(CD3) from BALB/c mice immunized with human thymocytes and lymphocytes wih Sezary cell leukemia. N901/NKH-1 (CD56) from BALB/c mice immunized with human chronic myeloid leukemia cells. Ig CHAIN: Mouse IgG1. SOURCE: Ascites fluid (CD56) Conditioned media (CD3). PURIFICATION: Affinity chromatography. CONJUGATION: CD3-FITC CD56-RD1. MOLAR RATIO: FITC/protein 3-10 RD1/protein 0.5-1.5. FLUORESCENCE:FITC (Green) Excites at 468-509 nm、Emits at 504-541 nm、RD1 (Orange) Excites at 486-580 nm Emits at 568-590 nm.The concentration of nonantibody reagents is 0.2% BSA, 0.01 M potassium phosphate, 0.15 M NaCl, 0.1%NaN3.
applicantName: 美商貝克曼庫爾特有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: 用流式細胞儀在全血樣品中總CD3+(T)細胞和CD3-/CD56+(NK，自然殺手)淋巴細胞進行同步識別和計數。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.5220 自動區別細胞計數器
